Golmanu Lidsa preti 12 utakmica suspenzije
Kiko Kasilja u velikom problemu

02 Nov 2019

Golman lidera Čempionšipa Lidsa Kiko Kasilja mogao bi da bude suspendovan između osam i 12 utakmica zbog rasističkih uvreda na račun napadača Čarltona Džonatana Leka koje je izrekao tokom okršaja ovih ekipa 28. septembra u Londonu.
Britanski mediji javljaju da je Fudbalska liga odmah posle meča pokrenula istragu protiv nekadašnjeg čuvara mreže Reala iz Madrida, a čitav slučaj prijavio je u izvšetaju glavni arbitar utakmice Džon Bruks.
Liga je u međuvremenu okončala istragu i ustanovila krivicu pa bi 33-godišnji golman Lidsa mogao na hlađenje čak do Nove godine.
Iako je Katalonac demantovao da je vređao Leka na rsdnoj osnovi kako mu se stavlja na teret, kazna je izvesna, pa će Marselo Bijelsa hitno morati da potraži novo rešenje pred golom pošto je Kasilja bio neprikosnoven do sada, a primio je i ubedljivo najmanje golova u ligi (samo osam).  
Foto: Reuters

The Leeds goalkeeper is threatened with 12 games of suspension
Kiko Cassilla in big trouble

02 Nov 2019

Leeds Championship goaltender Kiko Cassilla could be suspended between eight and 12 games for racist insults at the expense of Charlton striker Jonathan Leck, who he delivered during a Sept. 28 clash in London.
British media reported that the Football League immediately after the match launched an investigation against the former Real Madrid guard, and the whole case was reported in the report by Chief Arbiter John Brooks.
The league, meanwhile, has ended its investigation and found fault, so the 33-year-old Leeds goalkeeper could cool down by the New Year.
Although the Catalan denied he insulted Lek on a rationale charge, the penalty is certain, so Marselo Bielsa will urgently need to find a new solution in front of goal since Casilla has been undeniable so far, and has received at least a few goals in league (only eight).
